message: If you are on a Mac, try hype.  It is a powerful html5 animation system
You can convert flash animations to html5 compatible version using Adobe Wallaby: http://labs.adobe.com/technologies/wallaby/

I'd go with @angularcircle's recommendation and use Wallaby. Hype is interesting, but personally I don't think it's useful. It's better suited to making 1990s style Flash websites, not full blown animations. I would look into Animatable: http://animatable.com/ — it's an upcoming online app. Here's a demo http://animatable.com/demos/madmanimation/
